citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an environment enhancement plan for the birds. The licensee must develop, document, and
follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of
birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and made available to APHIS upon request.
Correct by: October 19, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
